testimonials_blockOne_body: Share a real testimonial that hits some of your benefits from one of your popular customer.
testimonials_blockTwo_body: Make sure you only pick the right sentence to keep it short and simple.
testimonials_blockThree_body: This is an awesome landing page template I've seen. I would use this for anything.
hero_header_websiteDescription: Free Landing Page Template for startups
hero_body_description: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.
index_benefits_title: Why should you use this landing page
index_benefits_bodyDescription: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.
index_video_title: Learn how to fullfil your needs
index_video_bodyDescription: This section is to highlight a promo or demo video of your product. Analysts says a landing page with video has 3% more conversion rate. So, don't forget to add one. Just like this.
index_testimonials_bodyDescription: Testimonails is a great way to increase the brand trust and awareness. Use this section to highlight your popular customers.
index_faq_bodyDescription: Answer your customers possible questions here, it will increase the conversion rate as well as support or chat requests.
cta_body: Don't let your visitors see a poor landing.
footer_description: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.
faq_faqdata_question1: Is this template completely free to use?
faq_faqdata_answer1: Yes, this template is completely free to use.
faq_faqdata_question2: Can I use it in a commercial project?
faq_faqdata_answer3: If you're unhappy with your purchase for any reason, email us within 90 days and we'll refund you in full, no questions asked.
faq_faqdata_question4: No, we don't offer technical support for free downloads. Please purchase a support plan to get 6 months of support.
popupWidget_subheader: We usually respond in a few hours
data_benefitOne_desc: You can use this space to highlight your first benefit or a feature of your product. It can also contain an image or Illustration like in the example along with some bullet points.
data_benefitOne_bulletOne_desc: Then explain the first point breifly in one or two lines.
data_benefitOne_bulletTwo_desc: Here you can add the next benefit point.
data_benefitOne_bulletThree_desc: This will be your last bullet point in this section.
data_benefitTwo_desc: You can use this same layout with a flip image to highlight your rest of the benefits of your product. It can also contain an image or Illustration as above section along with some bullet points.
data_benefitTwo_bulletOne_desc: Nextly is designed as a mobile first responsive template.
data_benefitTwo_bulletTwo_desc: This template is powered by latest technologies and tools.
data_benefitTwo_bulletThree_desc: Nextly comes with a zero-config light & dark mode.
